WCD Odisha Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 91 Anganwadi Worker & Helper Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 22, 2025, 15:34 IST
 Women and Child Development
 91 Jobs |  Posted On : 22-Aug-2025 |  Odisha |  Salary : 10,000 to 12,000




FOLLOW

The Women & Child Development Department, Odisha (WCD Odisha) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 91 Anganwadi Helper & Worker Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 12th can apply for the WCD Odisha Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Odisha.

WCD Odisha Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Anganwadi Helper	51	12th
Anganwadi Worker	40

WCD Odisha Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 35 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the  Organisation's norms.

WCD Odisha Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Written Test.
Interview.

WCD Odisha Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

WCD Odisha Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 10,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 12,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the WCD Odisha Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the WCD Odisha Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	08-08-2025
Closing date	04-09-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
